def_cn: （书、通常指童书打开时）有跳起立体图片的
def_en: A pop-up book, usually a child- ren's book, has pictures that stand up when you open the pages.

def_cn: （烤面包片机）自动跳起式的
def_en: A pop-up toaster has a mechanism that pushes slices of bread up when they are toasted.

def_cn: （显示屏上的菜单或广告）弹出式的
def_en: On a computer screen, a pop-up menu or advertisement is a small window containing a menu or advertisement that appears on the screen when you perform particular operations.
